text:
11.10. Summary 205
11.10 Summary
In this tutorial, you discovered how to develop a framework from scratch for grid searching
simple naive and averaging strategies for time series forecasting with univariate data. Speciﬁcally,
you learned:
 How to develop a framework for grid searching simple models from scratch using walk-
forward validation.
 How to grid search simple model hyperparameters for daily time series data for births.
